prompt: Create a profile page with a soft pastel theme, featuring a circular profile picture (120px diameter) at the top center with a pastel pink border. The user's name should be in bold pastel blue text (font size 26), and the email in pastel purple (font size 16). Place three action buttons (Edit Profile, Settings, Logout) in a vertical stack, each with a pastel pink background, white text, and rounded corners (radius 20). Use a pastel yellow background (#FFFDE7) with moderate padding (24px). Center the content vertically and add a soft glow effect to the profile picture.
